name: 2D SHOOTER PROJECT WOOOO
description:
My 2D Shooter Project Tutorial Submission!!!

Proposed Mods:

1. I'm thinking about making 10 levels, each one getting progressively harder as time goes on

2. I want to see if I can maybe make a beat track for the audio

3. Want to add a powerup in which the player cannot be killed

4. Want to add a display for player lives

5. Want to add a ship select screen(pretty difficult as of now, will probably ask for help)

Created By: Aiden Kalisz

Credits to MSU CAS 117 for all assets used in this project
